entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this afternoon then clearing. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 1.
